Package org.apache.logging.log4j.core.impl

Class ThrowableFormatOptions

java.lang.Object
org.apache.logging.log4j.core.impl.ThrowableFormatOptions
public final class ThrowableFormatOptions extends Object
Contains options which control how a Throwable pattern is formatted.
